ToolingÂ¶

  • Implementation in Python 3

  • Main editor is Visual Studio Code

  • Static analysis and quality inspections are done in PyCharm

  • Development environment is using pipenv

  • Documentation is done with Sphinx

  • Documentation hosting with ReadTheDocs

  • CI/CD with CircleCI

  • Test coverage with CodeCov

  • Python package repository PyPi

  • Github badges are provided through shields.io
